website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty tire for daily commuting or leisure rides, though mounting can be a challenge.
pros: Lasts over 500 miles in daily road use
Easy to pack away as a spare
Good grip yet low rolling resistance
cons: Folding bead construction can make them more difficult to mount
Worn tire can split along its seams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect recipe: Cheap, easy to mount, grippy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tires for their price. I find tires to be a consumable item. I ride aggressively, kind of like I was on a supermoto. I brake hard, accelerate hard, and "back it in" (slide) to corners. I go through tires about a set every 4-5 months. Naturally, I bought these because they were the cheapest ones that fit. Mounting them was easy, and they don't seem to be directional. They're rated 50-75psi. Do be warned they're 700cx35 and my old ones were 700cx25, so they're considerably fatter. No big deal, maybe a little more rolling resistance. They are very comfortable and have a lot of grip.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Smith

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS, however...
customer_reviews.text: These tires are bargain priced, seemingly high quality, and they are lined with kevlar! Unfortunately, they didn’t fit my 700c wheels. I wish I could share more of an experience, but they were a just too big. I ended up returning them and purchasing a different name brand tire. For the price, I’d still recommend them...if they fit your wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Wolf

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I've had these for a few months now ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've had these for a few months now and they show no wear at all. I have ran over glass several times and have yet to get a puncture. As of now, I highly recommend them as they are cheap and seem highly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a problem with this tire and have ordered several online over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Kevlar does nothing to stop punctures
customer_reviews.text: Twice I have suffered punctures with this tire. I put tire liner inside to keep from getting future flats. Kevlar my a$$.
customer_reviews.author: LarryLMedina

customer_reviews.title: I think it will be fine. Good price
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed yet. Bought this one to match one on a bike that I bought. I think it will be fine. Good price too
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the tire so far. It looks rugged yet has a smooth ride, which I am concerned with since these rural Texas roads are a bit rough textured.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Perry

customer_reviews.title: LOve these tires!
customer_reviews.text: Fine tire - using these for years and no flats until the tread wears down significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Delta Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Good tire, good value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Changed both tires on the bike and very satisfied with the ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tires for my ride to work every day
customer_reviews.text: Best tires for my ride to work every day! I have used these on several other bikes never had a flat! The tires were shipped exactly as promised and the price was cheaper than I could of hoped for.VERY SATISFIED!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Scott c yurkovich

customer_reviews.title: These tires wear much better than the tires that came with my Schwin Hybrid
customer_reviews.text: These tires wear much better than the tires that came with my Schwin Hybrid. I put quite a few miles on the bike as I ride it to work and home for lunch every day I work, plus around town.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B.

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Big. Meaty nice fitting great ride I'd buy this tire again any size all my bikes just do it
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tire..I have put it on several different size wheels...works on all
customer_reviews.author: ralph

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Initial Report is that these are OK - I'm not too sure how well these are balanced.
customer_reviews.author: kevin hughes

customer_reviews.title: sidewalls have cracked on both of our bikes. i would not recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: sidewalls have cracked on both of our bikes. i would not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: sailorman

customer_reviews.title: tire is now useless.
customer_reviews.text: Tires were really difficult to install the first time because the sides are splayed out. Had to tape a couple sides down. Then the front tire, after being ridden for a week, obtained a hole, tire is now useless.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Stay away if you value your life!
customer_reviews.text: Stay away if you value your life! These don't seat properly on the rims! These tires popped off my rims while I was riding and I was lucky I didn't wreck. I only had these pressurized to 60psi which is well within the range of 50-75psi listed on the tire itself.
customer_reviews.author: Tim W.

customer_reviews.title: Showing no wear and I have put a lot of miles on them
customer_reviews.text: Great tires I have had them almost a year now my only flats were caused by some really wicked thorns and a bad tube. My bike is my transportation so I have put a lot of miles on these tires.
customer_reviews.author: loving grandma

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Just the tire i needed, a little hard to mount but not bad tire came as ordered so all is well
customer_reviews.author: Dale D.

product_meta.title: Bell INERTIA Road Tire 700c x 32-45 Black Kevlar
product_meta.description: Our Bell Road Bike Tire with Kevlar features a rugged carbon steel bead and a layer of DuPont KEVLAR. The tire folds and unfolds without damage. KEVLAR layer provides extra protection against flats. Available in 26" x 1 3/8" and 27" x 1 1/4".
feature_bullets: KEVLAR layer provides more strength and extra puncture resistance
Carbon steel bead allows tire to be folded without damage for easy storage
Inverted tread provides sure grip but less rolling resistance for easier pedaling on pavement
